subject: Advertising and Marketing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series

Logos
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. league officials have discussed the possibility of adding corporate sponsor logos to jerseys, and it could be voted on when N.B.A. owners meet in October.
snippet: N.B.A. league officials have discussed the possibility of adding corporate sponsor logos to jerseys, and it could be voted on when N.B.A. owners meet in October.
